bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of pain exactly in the stomach pit. Note: xin 心 , in the sense of center, is a reference here to the stomach. Zhong zang jing 中藏經 Fj: 病甚則腹脅脹滿，吐逆不入食，當心 痛，上下不通 , “When the disease is serious this leads to distension and a feeling of fullness in the abdomen and flanks. Patients vomit with counterflow, and cannot eat. They experience pain exactly in the center , and there is no passage from above to below”.
